text: New game, fresh faces, let's see who comes out on top!
Early game feeling out process, some tentative probing.
Josh needs to decide if he wants to call with seven-four.
Mariano also has a call to make with Queen-three.
Mariano raises to three hundred! The tension is rising.
Mike X three-bets to one thousand four hundred with pocket tens!
Ace-Ten-Queen on the flop! Mariano checks, what will Mike X do?
Mike X bets one thousand, Mariano calls! The pot is now five thousand fifty.
